daily_take.headline: Iran Strike Odds Collapse as Market Prices Out Imminent Conflict
daily_take.deck: The odds of a US military strike on Iran dropped 4 points in 24 hours, settling at 18.5% and signaling traders are backing away from near-term escalation. The $1M in volume suggests serious money is reassessing the risk premium that built up in recent weeks. Geopolitical tensions remain real, but the market's consensus shift matters more than the headline risk.
